[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Terms and Conditions of Use” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:36px|text_align:left|color:%23022f66″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]
  1. Height Restrictions: Some rides may have height restrictions, and guests must comply with these restrictions. If you are unsure about the restrictions, please ask a staff member, however they will be clearly stated on the sign boards right next to each pool, slide or ride.
  2. Weight Limits: Some rides may have weight limits, and guests must comply with these limits. If you are unsure about the limits, please ask a staff member however they will be clearly stated on the sign boards right next to each pool, slide or ride.
  3. Age Restrictions: Some rides may have age restrictions, and guests must comply with these restrictions. If you are unsure about the restrictions, please ask a staff member, however they will be clearly stated on the sign boards right next to each pool, slide or ride.
  4. Health Issues: Guests with pre-existing medical conditions or disabilities should consult a physician before using the park’s attractions as Giwa Gardens cannot be held liable for accidents or complications as a result.
  5. Responsibility for Children: Parents or guardians are responsible for their children’s safety and behaviour at all times. Children under the age of 12 must be accompanied by an adult.
  6. Property: The park is not responsible for any lost or stolen property. Please keep your property close to you and guarded.
  7. Photography and Video: While you are allowed to take photos and videos of your experience at Giwa Gardens, the park reserves the sole right to record videos and take photos of guests using the park’s attractions. The park may choose to share these photos and videos with guests or use them for marketing and sales purposes or for legal activities as evidence.
  8. Prohibited Items: No outside food, beverages, or glass containers are allowed in the park. Alcohol and illegal drugs are strictly prohibited.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Liability Waiver” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:34|text_align:left|color:%23022f66″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]In consideration of being allowed to use the facilities and attractions of the water park, I and family members or friends I bring along, agree to the following:

  1. I understand and acknowledge that using the park’s attractions involves certain risks, including but not limited to the risk of injury, illness, or death.
  2. I understand and acknowledge that the park has taken reasonable measures to ensure the safety of its attractions, including the presence of qualified lifeguards and other safety measures.
  3. I acknowledge that I am responsible for my own safety and the safety of any children in my care.
  4. I hereby release and discharge the park, its owners, employees, and agents from any and all claims, demands, causes of action, damages, or liability arising out of or in connection with my use of the park’s facilities and attractions, including but not limited to any injury, illness, or death.
  5. I agree to indemnify and hold harmless the park, its owners, employees, and agents from any and all claims, demands, causes of action, damages, or liability arising out of or in connection with my use of the park’s facilities and attractions.
  6. I acknowledge that I have read and understand the park’s terms and conditions of use, and agree to comply with them.
  7. I agree that this waiver shall be binding upon me, my heirs, executors, administrators, and assigns.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
